abstract: The managed-care company said that it would pay $350 million to settle the class-action suit over reimbursement for out-of-network claims.
snippet: The managed-care company said that it would pay $350 million to settle the class-action suit over reimbursement for out-of-network claims.
lead_paragraph: The insurance giant UnitedHealth Group said Thursday that it had reached a $350 million deal to settle class-action lawsuits claiming it had underpaid patients and doctors.

headline.main: UnitedHealth Settlement Near, but Faces a Protest
headline.print_headline: UnitedHealth Settlement Near, but Faces a Protest
